abstract.para: You can use the following checklist if you are not able to perform file or folder copy using rsync.

listitem.para: The specified hostname corresponds to the correct storage location (Example, vny, cpm, or ams). The rsync hostname assigned to your account is listed on the RSYNC page.
The command used to transfer your content matches the syntax defined below. rsync -avp {Local Path} {User Name}@rsync.yyy.AN.{Base Domain}:{Destination Path}
The {Local path} points to an existing folder on your system.
Ensure that {Destination Path} starts with a forward slash. /DestinationFolder
